title: Legendary Musical Collab! Bappi Lahiri To Record Two Duets With Lady Gaga And A Track With Akon
text:
This is a special year for Bappi Lahiri and for reasons more than one. Apart from completing 50 years as a composer and giving the world 600 films and over, 9000 songs, the journey for 66-year-old composer has just begun is what it seems! Talking from Los Angeles he dropped information about his upcoming projects that are important!

Confirming the news to Mumbai Mirror, Bappi Lahiri said,

"Yes, two duets, with her singing in English and me in Hindi in my inimitable style. We are now waiting for the release to be greenlit, hopefully by the year-end. I also collaborated with Akon two months ago. That song should also be out soon."

But when we he was quizzed about more details, he teased and said,"Abhi itna hi."

Well, that's not all. Reports claim that Jamie Jones and The Martinez Brothers have also remixed ‘Jimmy Jimmy’ as a tribute to Lahiri to celebrate his 50th year!

Don't Miss 34.4 K SHARES 5.1 K SHARES 4 K SHARES 5.2 K SHARES 5.2 K SHARES
